1.name: Divine Raiment of the Dragon Fish
details: The attack and magic attack bonuses apply before percentage bonuses: if #{hero} has a +100% attack bonus, she will receive a total of +16 attack from #{this}.

2.name: Dragon Emblem
2.effect: Raises #{hero}'s attack by 50% for one attack.
details: After one attack, Dragon Emblem is destroyed.

3.name: Hakurouken
3.effect: #{hero} gets +50% attack, but may use only one spellcard
details: #{hero} may switch out instead of using a spellcard. If #{hero} switches out and later switches back in, she may use a different spellcard.
If #{hero} loses #{this}, she may use a different spellcard.

4.name: Dubious Mushroom
4.effect: At the end of the turn, #{hero} is afflicted with Curse of Poison.
